title: suggestion to improve "Codelab: Writing Web Applications"
body:
I try to learn 'go' from this tutorial.
But, I suggest improve document in these points.
I think that will help novice programmer like me.

1. why can not use simple form?
global form:
var templates = make(map[string]*template.Template)
simple form:
templates = make(map[string]*template.Template)

2. missing titleValidator variable

3. I got 'Editing line 7: name not exported: title in type *main.page' when launch
localhost:8080/view/ANewPage

I don't know how to fix this bug, it is not on line 7 of wiki.go
I attached my source which typed by myself from the tutorial.
Attachments: 1. wiki.go (2754 bytes)
